instructions: Open the WhatsApp app on your iPhone or Android smartphone . Tap Chats . On iPhone, tap Broadcast Lists . On Android, tap More Options . On iPhone, tap New List . On Android, tap New Broadcast . Select the contacts you want to add to your WhatsApp Broadcast List. If you have yet to add contacts to WhatsApp , make sure you do that first. Tap Create . Your Broadcast List will now be created.
